(https://www.dapperlabs.com)","kind":"dev","methods":{"freeze()":{"details":"A frozen contract will be frozen forever, there's no way to undo this action."},"setCEO(address)":{"params":{"_newCEO":"The address of the new CEO"}},"setCFO(address)":{"params":{"_newCFO":"The address of the new CFO"}},"setCOO(address)":{"params":{"_newCOO":"The address of the new COO"}},"setLostAndFound(address)":{"params":{"_newLostAndFound":"The address of the new lostAndFound address"}}},"title":"Contract that manages addresses and access modifiers for certain operations.","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"freeze()":{"notice":"Called by CEO or CFO role to freeze the contract.  Only intended to be used if a serious exploit is detected.Allow two C-level roles to call this function in case either CEO or CFO key is compromised.This is a one-way process; there is no un-freezing."},"frozen()":{"notice":"Keeps track whether the contract is frozen.  When frozen is set to be true, it cannot be set back to false again,  and all whenNotFrozen actions will be blocked."},"setCEO(address)":{"notice":"Assigns a new address to act as the CEO. Only available to the current CEO."},"setCFO(address)":{"notice":"Assigns a new address to act as the CFO. Only available to the current CEO."},"withdrawTotalCFOEarnings()":{"notice":"CFO withdraws the CFO earnings"},"withdrawTotalLostAndFoundBalance()":{"notice":"LostAndFound account withdraws all the lost and found amount"}},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"project:/contracts/Offers.sol":"OffersAccessControl"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"project:/contracts/Offers.sol":{"keccak256":"0x593fa64a5e2848e6357c5538bfcca47bb4598fb0e0f92536e4cec3e214ebde96","license":"GPL-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://d75691931e41cc52bff6c9c1f875a1eaae5190e9905688dfabd22488944aee08","dweb:/ipfs/QmQvivqrL3vFrwnYybiULGBKHnceQwTceTzbh4V3MoBSL7"]}},"version":1}

devdoc.author: Dapper Labs Inc. (https://www.dapperlabs.com)

freeze().details: A frozen contract will be frozen forever, there's no way to undo this action.

params._newCEO: The address of the new CEO

params._newCFO: The address of the new CFO

params._newCOO: The address of the new COO

params._newLostAndFound: The address of the new lostAndFound address

devdoc.title: Contract that manages addresses and access modifiers for certain operations.

freeze().notice: Called by CEO or CFO role to freeze the contract.  Only intended to be used if a serious exploit is detected.Allow two C-level roles to call this function in case either CEO or CFO key is compromised.This is a one-way process; there is no un-freezing.

frozen().notice: Keeps track whether the contract is frozen.  When frozen is set to be true, it cannot be set back to false again,  and all whenNotFrozen actions will be blocked.

setCEO(address).notice: Assigns a new address to act as the CEO. Only available to the current CEO.

setCFO(address).notice: Assigns a new address to act as the CFO. Only available to the current CEO.

setCOO(address).notice: Assigns a new address to act as the COO. Only available to the current CEO.

setLostAndFound(address).notice: Assigns a new address to act as the LostAndFound account. Only available to the current CEO.

withdrawTotalLostAndFoundBalance().notice: LostAndFound account withdraws all the lost and found amount
